name: Tetrick (テトリック)
description:
◆ ◇ Ultimate operability realized ◇ ◆
Finished 8 months development period, finally completed.
Please experience the best smoothness ever in the application that fits on your fingers.

■ About operation
All operations complete with flick

Move horizontally: swipe left or right or flick

Rotation: Tap

Fall at double speed: Flick down

Immediate drop: flick on

* Double speed & rapid fall can also be done with button
